title: We welcome your furry friends! Pet Friendly! 1 Bd / 1 Ba / 800 SqFt
posting_body: ['IMT Prestonwood', 'Located at: 15480 Dallas Parkway Dallas, TX 75248', 'Featured unit: 1 bed | 1 bath | 800 sq ft', 'Prices start at: $1755/month', 'Call Today!', 'show contact info', '"Putting You First!"', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'Make yourself at home in one of our thoughtfully designed one and two bedroom homes at IMT Prestonwood and enjoy the splendor of custom interior amenities to give you a sense of modern comfort.', 'Fully equipped, gourmet kitchens with ENERGY STAR® appliances, quartz countertops, maple shaker-style cabinetry, and two-tone designer paint are some of the amenities one can expect from IMT Prestonwood.', 'Enjoy community amenities with indulgence in mind, such as two swimming pools, the Fitness Zone, the fully equipped Cyber Lounge, the Sports Lounge, a dog park, and a Pet Grooming Center.', 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!', '<URL>', 'Wonderful Amenities!', '✓ Bike Racks', '✓ Clubhouse', '✓ Courtesy Patrol', '✓ Cyber Lounge', '✓ Dog Park', '✓ Fitness Center', '✓ Free Weights', '✓ Sports Lounge', '✓ Swimming Pool', '✓ Valet Trash', '✓ Cardio Training', '✓ Courtesy Patrol', '✓ Electric Vehicle Charging Station', '✓ Fitness Center', '✓ Gas Barbecue Grills', '✓ Gated Community', '✓ Online Services', '✓ Recycling | Trash Chutes', '✓ Resident Parking Garage', '✓ Resident Portal', 'Apartment Features!', '✓ Central Tankless Water Heater System', '✓ Dual Sinks in Select Bathrooms', '✓ Formal Dining Area (select homes)', '✓ LED Lighting & Fluorescent Lamps', '✓ Lush Carpet in Bedrooms', '✓ Maple, Shaker-Style Cabinetry', '✓ Quartz Countertops', '✓ Two-Tone Designer Paint', '✓ Walk-In Closets', '✓ Wood-Style Flooring', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Terms:', '12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'At IMT Presonwood, we know that the path to your heart is marked with paw prints and that the best part of your day is coming home to a wagging tail.', 'Pets are residents too!', 'Pet Limit: Maximum 2 pets.', 'Weight Restrictions: 1st floor-none.', 'All other floors: Under 25 lbs .', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit: $250 (refundable) per pet.', 'Pet Fee: $250 (non-refundable) per pet.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A33A2A3595FC44']
